title: The Shoemaker and the elves
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Gakken Company
brief_description: The story of th elves who slip into his shop and make shoes for the shoemaker is retold with animated puppets. This charming film, based on a Grimm fairytale, tells what happens when the shoemaker and his wife leave new clothes, food and sweets for the elves one night.
